fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: string of alpha and digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: SRC_RA
fields.doc: RA of the center of the error circle that was searched to determine this limiting magnitude from source in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SRC_DEC
fields.doc: Dec of the center of the error circle that was searched to determine this limiting magnitude from source in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: SOURCE
fields.doc: indicates the source of the RA,Dec-location error circle that was searched to yield the limiting magnitude for the UVOT non-detection.  The values are: 0  undefined 1  BAT 2  XRT 3  Other

fields.name: MAG_LIMIT
fields.doc: lower limit magnitude (in the specified filter) of the burst observation[mag]

fields.name: MISC_18
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined

fields.name: MISC_19
fields.doc: 32 Flag Bits. See https://gcn.gsfc.nasa.gov/sock_pkt_def_doc.html for definition of bits, some bits may not be defined
